With respect to TransGuard 's claims of work product protection , the Court found that claim reserves information that was noted in the file after March 13 , 2012 was protected work product .

In so doing , the Court explained that the Eighth Circuit draws a distinction between individual case reserves , which are typically prepared in anticipation of litigation and thus protected from discovery , and aggregate reserve information used for business - planning purposes .
